verses.text: ‘Sore \w have|strong="H3478"\w* \w they|strong="H3478"\w* \w vexed|strong="H6887"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w* \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w youth|strong="H5271"\w*’ thus \w let|strong="H4994"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w say|strong="H3478"\w*

‘Sore \w have|strong="H1571"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w vexed|strong="H6887"\w* \w me|strong="H3808"\w* \w from|strong="H1571"\w* \w youth|strong="H5271"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H1571"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w prevailed|strong="H3201"\w* \w against|strong="H1571"\w* \w me|strong="H3808"\w*.

‘\w The|strong="H5921"\w* ploughers ploughed \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w back|strong="H1354"\w*, \w they|strong="H5921"\w* made \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w furrows|strong="H4618"\w* \w long|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w But|strong="H7563"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w*, \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w cut|strong="H7112"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w cords|strong="H5688"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*.’

Let \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H6726"\w* \w haters|strong="H8130"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w* \w be|strong="H6726"\w* put \w to|strong="H3605"\w* shame \w and|strong="H6726"\w* defeated.

\w May|strong="H1961"\w* \w they|strong="H1406"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w grass|strong="H2682"\w* \w on|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* house-top, \w which|strong="H2682"\w* \w withers|strong="H3001"\w* \w before|strong="H6927"\w* \w it|strong="H1961"\w* shoots \w up|strong="H3001"\w*;

which \w fills|strong="H4390"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H4390"\w* arms \w of|strong="H4390"\w* \w the|strong="H4390"\w* \w reaper|strong="H7114"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H4390"\w* lap \w of|strong="H4390"\w* \w the|strong="H4390"\w* \w binder|strong="H6014"\w* \w of|strong="H4390"\w* \w sheaves|strong="H6014"\w*

whereof \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* says \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w pass|strong="H5674"\w*, ‘\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w blessing|strong="H1293"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w upon|strong="H5674"\w* \w you|strong="H1288"\w*.’ \w In|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* \w you|strong="H1288"\w*.
